Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix

  • public final class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Compilation: javac Matrix.java Execution: java Matrix A bare-bones data type for M-by-N matrices. Modified from https://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/java/95linear/Matrix.java.html

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix(double[][] data)
      Creates a matrix from a two dimensional array
      Matrix(int M, int N)
      Creates a matrix of zeroes that is M-by-N

      subtract matrix B from invoking matrix

      • eq

        public boolean eq(Matrix B)
        Determines if two matrix are exactly equal, assuming they are exactly same dimension
        Parameters:
        B - matrix to check equality with
        Returns:
        true if same size and every entry is identical; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If matrices are not of same dimension
